description: An object that describes single IP address.

hostname.description: The hostname of this endpoint. Must be valid DNS-1123 label if specified.

ip.description: The IP of this endpoint. May not be unspecified (0.0.0.0), loopback (127.0.0.0/8), link-local (169.254.0.0/16), or link-local multicast (224.0.0.0/24). IPv6 is accepted but not fully supported on all platforms. Certain kubernetes components, like kube-proxy, are not IPv6 ready.

nodeName.description: Node hosting this endpoint. This can be used to determine endpoints local to a node. The value must be a valid DNS subdomain name.

targetRef.description: Reference to object providing the endpoint.
